text: Va [ej mu'minon] sumoro ci sudaast, ki dar rohi Alloh taolo va [ʙaroi jorii] mardonu zanon va kudakoni sitamdida pajkor namekuned? Hamon kasone, ki megujand: "Parvardigoro, moro az in sahr [-i Makka], ki ahlas sitamgorand, ʙerun ʙiʙar va az suji xes ʙaroi mo joru korsoze qaror ʙideh va az coniʙi xud jovaru madadgore ʙarojamon ʙigumor
